description: Kevin Williams comes home to find Tom Brock asleep on his bed.  Kevin knows that the best way to wake a sleeping stud is to start sucking his cock.  Sure enough, Tom is awake in no time and fingering Kevin's hole.  While all of this is going on Eric Manchester is a burglar who breaks in.  The guys don't know what to do and Eric takes advantage of Kevin's ass.
title: In Your Wildest Dreams, Scene #03
